Sentencas: Promising cathode materials Pr2-x(La/Nd)xNiO4+delta (x = 0, 0.5, 1) for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC) were synthesised via a Pechini route.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions

Sentencas: The samples were studied by in situ XRD in the conditions close to operating for IT-SOFC cathode.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions

Sentencas: For all the samples a phase inhomogeneity was determined, manifesting itself in the apparent presence of two phases with the same 1st order Ruddlesden-Popper structure.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions

Sentencas: The two phases had different unit cell parameters and slightly different phase transition (sp.gr.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions
In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions

Sentencas: For the as-synthesised PrNdNiO4+delta sample a loss of crystallinity, accompanied by a release of H2, H2O, CO2 and CO gases upon heating in an inert atmosphere, was observed.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions

Sentencas: The crystallinity of the sample was recovered upon subsequent heating in an air atmosphere.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions

Sentencas: La-and Nd-doping increased thermal stability of samples compared to the undoped one in air at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions

Sentencas: In situ XRD experiments were supplemented by TGA/DTA measurements performed in the same conditions.
Titulo: In situ XRD and TGA/DTA study of multiphase La- and Nd-substituted Pr2NiO4 under IT-SOFC cathode operating conditions
